title: An Alien Collective
description: Cyn wakes up to find herself stranded on an alien planet. She finds seven other teenaged humans have also been abducted, and they are as confused as she is.To Cynâ€™s delight, and some apprehension, 24 aliens (all teens on their own planets) have also been deposited there: 8 Temman, 8 Irandi, 8 Reannone.Every day, supplies and instructions get delivered.After a time, the four races create a working collective, but they soon decide to rebel.The Guardian appears and sends them on a series of quests, but they still do not know the grand purpose of the experiment.
author: Roxanne Barbour
